svcsubproc.title: Passenger Entry Door
svcsubproc.para: The passenger side entry doors are aluminum structured door assemblies utilizing increased height and through door visibility with larger functional glass areas. The door are electrically operated by the driver switch located in the steering wheel control panels. An emergency override switch is located on the overhead panel above the entry door. The passenger door assembly is also available as an air activated assembly. The air actuated override switch is located on the drivers right wing panel.

note.para: The electric operated door opener has no speed adjustment control but limit switches can adjust the door opening limits.
The air operated passenger door opening speed may be adjusted to allow for open and closing cycle times. The door mechanism is located above the entry door header and has a manual override.
